rows.label: qst630501_msg0001
rows.name: Hey, ladies...

rows.label: qst630501_msg0002
rows.name: ...Wow, you look tough.

rows.label: qst630501_msg0003
rows.name:
We sure are!
Tough as nails, us.

rows.label: qst630501_msg0004
rows.name: Wait, I look tough too? Awesome!

rows.label: qst630501_msg0005
rows.name:
Uh, well...
Maybe you're more like "adorable"...?
...In a tough kind of way?

rows.label: qst630501_msg0006
rows.name:
Teheheh...
Thanks, buddy!

rows.label: qst630501_msg0007
rows.name:
So, now that we've established that,
did you want something from us?

rows.label: qst630501_msg0008
rows.name:
Right, yes.
Lately even our Liberalitan Archipelago
isn't safe from trouble...

rows.label: qst630501_msg0009
rows.name:
An unspeakably evil monster called
Pelagic Vincent has recently made
Merclibay Islet its home.

rows.label: qst630501_msg0010
rows.name:
Even passing Divine Beast ships aren't safe 
from this nasty thing!

rows.label: qst630501_msg0011
rows.name:
A whole three of them have been
sunk already this month...

rows.label: qst630501_msg0012
rows.name: Right, so...

rows.label: qst630501_msg0013
rows.name:
You seem like you can handle
yourselves, so I thought maybe
you could get rid of it for us...

rows.label: qst630501_msg0014
rows.name:
Wait, Raiko looks like she can
handle herself?

rows.label: qst630501_msg0015
rows.name:
Uh, well... She definitely could...
handle herself...adorably...?

rows.label: qst630501_msg0016
rows.name:
Teheheh...
Thanks again!

rows.label: qst630501_msg0017
rows.name:
Anyway, back to the topic at hand...
You should know we've asked a few
Drivers already, but none succeeded.

rows.label: qst630501_msg0018
rows.name:
The beast is as mighty as it is foul.
Still, we offer a reward that is more
than adequate...

rows.label: qst630501_msg0019
rows.name:
Does it sound like something
you could take on?

rows.label: qst630501_msg0020
rows.name:
I'm getting a good feeling here!
Aren't you, Driver? Let's show the
bastard who's strongest!

rows.label: qst630501_msg0021
rows.name: That's what I'm talking about!

rows.label: qst630501_msg0022
rows.name: I will follow my Driver's call.

rows.label: qst630501_msg0023
rows.name:
I'm feeling a bit overwhelmed if I'm
honest, but I promise I'll do my best!

rows.label: qst630501_msg0024
rows.name: Thanks!

rows.label: qst630501_msg0025
rows.name:
Like I said then, Pelagic Vincent is
on Merclibay Islet.

rows.label: qst630501_msg0026
rows.name: Come back in one piece, you hear?

rows.label: qst630501_msg0101
rows.name:
Hmm...
No, you're not ready for this.

rows.label: qst630501_msg0102
rows.name:
As you are now... Well, it's more likely
that it'll take you down than the other 
way round.

rows.label: qst630501_msg0201
rows.name:
Leave it to us!
We'll get this sorted out.
